name: Bayview Hunters Point Center for Arts and Technology
description: BAYCAT educates, empowers and employs youth and young adults to produce digital media that tells their unique stories and engages them to positively transform themselves, their communities, and the world.
fullDescription: BAYCAT educates, empowers and employs youth and young adults to produce digital media that tells their unique stories and engages them to positively transform themselves, their communities, and the world.
whatTheyOffer: BAYCAT exists to end racial, gender, and economic inequity by creating powerful, authentic media while diversifying the creative industry. Through the education and employment of young and aspiring BIPOC (Black, Indigenous, people of color), LGBTQIA+, and women artists from historically oppressed communities and low-income backgrounds and by producing media for socially-minded clients.
